item.title: Right-click kick, i know it sound a little noobish...~~please help!~~
item.dc:creator: @telekinetic telekinetic
item.description:
@telekinetic wrote:

I know this sounds a little noobish, but i need the code for right-click kick…cuz atm…i have a right click jail…but i want it to be kick, please help!!

here is the code i have for right click jail…

case 153: //Right-click jaling. if (playerRights >= 2) { int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2]; client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(p5.playerName)]; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName+" Jailed "+p5.playerName; c.teleportToX = 2451; c.teleportToY = 4938; c.teleblock = true; c.frame99(2); c.mutedate = 2147000000; c.savemoreinfo(); c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); p5.frame99(2); } break;

and this is my text for it, that appear when u right click…

if (playerRights == 3) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("@red@-jail-"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

so i changed the ‘jail’ into kick…and how i change the first code? ‘case 153’?

please really need this noobish help…

Read full topic
